event.2: Collect information of the boy for Rise Kujikawa: Talk with Kanji Tatsumi at the riverbed of Samegawa Flood Plain, then go to the Shopping District South and talk to Dojima Ryotaro in front of the Gas Station. You should be able to find Adachi and talk to him at Junes tomorrow

event.1: After talking to Adachi, you can get information from Souzai Daigaku at Shopping District North
